name: Boxing superstars KO Champion
description:
A new boxing game is available for all boxing fans! Fight 4 professionals in intense combat. Jab, cross, uppercut, give in all you have, but don’t forget to dodge!. Go through the levels and conquer the increasing difficulty. Don’t doubt yourself and gain the victory!

Boxing superstar ko champion is a game that test your reflexes and your capacity to anticipate strikes. Become a real boxer with this game that will awake your warrior soul!

How to play?
Like in real boxing, you can throw many punches: uppercut, jab, cross and dodging. Knock-out all your opponents and the victory is yours.

Characteristics
- Boxing
- 4 opponents
- 20 levels
- Uppercut, jab, cross, dodge.
